splash.title: hello world!
splash.content: welcome to jozhua ten's online playground

about.content:
i'm a software engineer from malaysia. i find programming interesting and creative because of the endless possibilities and perspectives - there's no be-all and end-all solution. i have developed and delivered solutions that enables companies to modernise and simplify business processes for over a year.

i'm also padi-certified open water diver, though sadly i haven't captured any underwater pictures yet. i like travelling and exploring new adventures - challenging myself to go beyond my comfort.

thanks for visiting my page! i'll be adding more content soon*, in the meantime, follow me at:
